page.title: 08The Local Policeman
page.content: Our policeman, P.C.Harry Edwards has lived in the area for 8 years. Being the only policeman on the island he has no chance of promotion without moving. He has become, through his helpful attitude and his involvement in youth activities a highly respected member of a practically crime-free island. He enjoys living here and dislike being called to work elsewhere He often visits our school for road safety, cycling proficiency and Top of the Form Contests which are organised by the Northern Constabulary. One of his hobbies is birdwatching and he can often be seen with his binoculars 'on the beat'. He dislikes living in the police house with its attached cell.He has had a variety of duties in his 8 years here but the oddest was 'arresting' 3 charity raising convicts heading for Muckle Flugga.
